name: A guiding star
description:
As your make your way trough a serene but dark forest, follow the mystical star to find your way to the end.

Use a grappling hook to swing trough the branches but beware of platforms breaking! Be sure to keep pace with the star, otherwise you might lose it! And it’s your only light and guide throughout the forest.

This game is an entry for the Warmest Game Jam, where we will try to collect as much as possible donations for the Warmste Week! Please enjoy this game and make  a small donation for TEJO!

The theme of the game was a ‘good cause’, we chose a cause called GuideStar which is a cause to help others find a charity to donate to.
